WAREHOUSE_TYPE_NOT_FOUND: Data Type Repository does not exist

WAREHOUSE_IMPORT_STATUS_INVALID: Status of warehouse import is invalid
SALE_ORDER_NOT_FOUND: Sales order data does not exist
CODE_IS_ALREADY_EXISTS: Value codes cannot be duplicated on the system
CODE_OR_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: Data Name or Code already exists
CAN_NOT_UPDATE_SAME_DATE: Can't update because there was an order made on the same day
CAN_NOT_UPDATE_QUANTITY: Inventory quantity data cannot be edited
ORDER_ITEM_NOT_FOUND: Can't find product data in order
ORDER_ITEM_QUANTITY_TOO_LARGE: The number of products is too large
INVALID_JOB_DATE_RANGE: Work date range not within plan date range
STATUS_INVALID: The maintenance request is in an invalid state
DEVICE_USED: The device is already in use, cannot be deleted/edited
CHECKLIST_TEMPLATE_CODE_IS_EXISTED: Sample code of the test sheet already exists
DEVICE_PERMISSION_DENIED: This device is not under your use
GENERAL_MAINTENANCE_PARAMETER_EXISTED: General maintenance property already exists record
DEVICE_REQUEST_TICKET_NOT_FOUND: Device level request does not exist
ID_DEVICE_REQUEST_TICKET_NOT_FOUND: deviceRequestId must be in the device request list
DEVICE_REQUEST_TICKET_USED: Requested device level is already in use, cannot be deleted/edited
MAINTENANCE_TEAM_USED: Maintenance team already in use, cannot delete
SUPPLY_GROUP_USED: The group of supplies has been used, cannot be deleted
CHECKLIST_DETAIL_TITLE_INVALID: Titles of items in a report must not overlap
DEVICE_RETURN_TICKET_NOT_FOUND: Device return request does not exist
DEVICE_RETURN_TICKET_USED: Request to return used device, cannot be deleted/edited
DEVICE_REQUEST_TICKET_CANNOT_HAVE_WORK_C: Factory cannot be selected for non-production equipment
DEVICE_NOT_ASSIGN_USE_AT: Device assignment with no use date
WORK_CENTER_NOT_IN_FACTORY: The workshop is not located in the factory
JOB_STATUS_INVALID: The job is in an invalid state
MAINTENANCE_ticket_NOT_FOUND: Maintenance ticket code does not exist
SUPPLY_NOT_FOUND: Spare parts and supplies do not exist
SUPPLY_CODE_EXIST: Code Supplies and spare parts already exist
SUPPLY_GROUP_NOT_FOUND: Group Supplies and spare parts does not exist
CHECK_LIST_TEMPLATE_NOT_FOUND: The sample code for the check sheet does not exist
STATUS_WARNING_INVALID: The warning is in an invalid state
MAINTENANCE_ticket_USED: Maintenance ticket already in use, cannot be deleted
PLAN_NAME_AND_CODE_CANNOT_UPDATE: Unable to update confirmed/rejected plan information
CHECK_JOB_DUPLICATE_DATE: Work assignment has been used during this time
DEVICE_ASSIGNMENT_STATUS_INVALID: The status of the device assignment is invalid
DATE_MUST_BE_IN_THE_PLAN: The expected implementation date must be in the plan
CAN_NOT_COMPLETED: This record could not be completed
START_DATE_NO_BIGGER_THAN_END_DATE: The start date cannot be greater than the end date
QUANTITY_INVALID: The number of products achieved must be less than the quantity produced
DEVICE_IS_NOT_MANUFACTURING: This equipment is not intended for production
ASSIGN_USER_IN_ASSIGN_TEAM: The person responsible was on the maintenance team
CHECKLIST_TEMPLATE_HAS_ASSIGN_DEVICE: The checklist template has been assigned to the device
INSTALLATION_TEMPLATE_HAS_ASSIGN_DEVICE: The installation template has been assigned to the device
ticket_TYPE_HAS_ASSIGN_DEVICE: The attirbute type has been assigned to the device
